name: PIZZA MAKER COOKING STAND 2016
description:
It’s Fun pizza maker cooking game for pizza lovers. pizza cooking game, make mouthwatering pizza for customer which will serve as real looking pizza in the end. It’s not an ordinary pizza making game, make pizza with love and serve it to your worthy customers and gather praise.
PIZZA MAKER COOKING STAND 2016!
IT’S AMAZING PIZZA MAKE & DASH GAME OF 2016!
We are pretty sure about your pizza making skills that’s why we requested you to cherish pizza stand Sharpen your skill as you prepare, cook, assemble and serve delicious menu items in your own world of pizza. Rock the pizza stand by making innovative style pizza fulfil the order of your customers to their heart full and serve them with best pizza in town in PIZZA MAKER COOKING STAND 2016. Your customers are too special to be serve on time with yummlicious pizza.

COOK BEST TASTE PIZZA IN NO TIME
Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the PIZZA stand as customer don’t like to wait for too long. Don’t let your customer’s mood to get off with too much delay in serving pizza or he/she may left the pizza stand in huff.

MANY DIFFICULT TASK TO GET MASTER PIZZA CHEF TITLE
Tons of fun cooking play across unique restaurant specially designed for pizza lovers. People love your recipes and efficiency of serving pizza in no time. Continue with same pace n good name for good will and complete orders in given time otherwise the fame will start getting reduce and you may lose the competition.
COLLECT AND UPGRADE!
Collect as many appreciation by earning stars from the customer, the less time you waste in serving the happier your customers would be. Hit the target before the customers feel so hungry and may now ready to stay on pizza stand anymore.

DIFFERENT INGREDIENTS DIFFERENT PIZZAS
We have gathered your favourite ingredients all at one place so that you may not to worry about it. Just assemble the best taste recipe of pizza according to the customer order and please them to fulsome. More customer you attend and serve pizza means more points.

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR??
Hit the install button right on the top of this game and play the interactive a new pace game of Pizza making. PIZZA MAKER COOKING STAND 2016. Serve the hungry pizza lover and be a part of epicene of pizza making
PIZZA AKER COOKING STAND 2016 is play for your IOS devices e.g. mobile phones and tablets.
FEATURES
Ultimate pizza cooking game of 2016!
Easy to use controls for baking, topping and serving
All type of ingredients used all over the world for pizza making
Bake and serve Pizza like professional Pizza Chefs

How to Play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game.
- Choose your favourite toppings to create the ultimate pizza.
- Cook your pizza and enjoy!
